name: colorcli_jedi_robot_alexei
summary: ./dreamsim.exe "Dream that was somehow based on the film monsters (2025) but ...

messages.message: ./dreamsim.exe "Dream that was somehow based on the film monsters (2025) but there was a large robot that seemed to be pulling the strings it was referred to as a Jedi in the closet and it was also my friend Alexei’s film which I later critiqued it to being not communicating what it was trying to or clearly despite being clearly interesting" --text NONE --spinners MAXIMZIE

./dreamsim.exe "the film monsters (2025) but there was a large robot that seemed to be pulling the strings it was referred to as a Jedi in the closet and it was also my friend Alexei’s film which I later critiqued it to being not communicating what it was trying to or clearly despite being clearly interesting" NO_TEXT=true!important --spinners

./dreamsim.exe "film monsters (2025) but there was a large robot that seemed to be pulling the strings it was referred to as a Jedi in the closet and it was also my friend Alexei’s film which I later critiqued it to being not communicating what it was trying to or clearly despite being clearly interesting" --text NONE  --animate true

./dreamsim.exe "film monsters (2025) but there was a large robot that seemed to be pulling the strings it was referred to as a Jedi in the closet and it was also my friend Alexei’s film which I later critiqued it to being not communicating what it was trying to or clearly despite being clearly interesting" --text NONE  --animate true  --headers false
